name: Parent'sLibrarian
0:
”Alexa, launch Parent's Librarian”
”Alexa, ask Parent's Librarian to recommend a book”
”Alexa, tell Parent's Librarian my child is a fan of Sandra Boynton”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: parent's librarian
des:
Parent's Librarian provides parents with insightful book recommendations for their kids. The skill incorporates the child's age, favorite authors, and enjoyed readings to determine an appropriate book recommendation. 

Parent's Librarian can be launched several different ways by specifying a favorite book or author, or the age of the child. Examples include:

"Alexa, open Parent's Librarian"
"Alexa, ask Parent's Librarian to recommend a book for my child"
"Alexa, tell Parent's Librarian my child is a fan of Sandra Boynton"
"Alexa, tell Parent's Librarian my child read Goodnight Moon"
"Alexa, ask Parent's Librarian what my five year old should read" 

You can ask for "help" at any time.

Books are added regularly to the library so please check back often.

We continue to work hard on improving Parent's Librarian's algorithms and data and would greatly appreciate your feedback. Please drop us a line at support(at)chatterlearning(dot)com to share your experience. We would love to hear from you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
